response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 to us due to its unique features, high-quality materials, and the expertise put into its creation. Considering its unparalleled benefits and capabilities, I kindly invite you to consider acquiring it for $14,000. This offer represents a fantastic opportunity to secure a remarkable asset at a competitive price. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this outstanding product into your possession.", "product_price": 14000}
